About Me

I am Daniel Ugbeye, a guy who recently got into the web development space. I am very passionate about coding, especially Object Oriented Programing(OOP) and I love to work with teams. Daniel is a self-motivated developer with a passion for programming, a strong sense of commitment and pays attention to detail. He is a lover of Object Oriented programming(OOP) style and can use any programming language that works well with OOP concepts. He is a team player and is able to work well under pressure with little or no supervision.
